name: Mario Maker
description:
MOVEMENT---------------------------

-------------------

Arrow keys     DOWN ARROW TO DROP HOLD UP TO JUMP HIGHER

 -------------------

WASD            S TO DROP HOLD W TO JUMP HIGHER

POWER UPS-----------------------------

------------------------

FIRE FLOWER: you need a mushroom to get it

when u get a mushrrom then a fire flower ur mario will become white then when u press X u can shoot fireballs

---------------------

MUSHROOM:gives an extra life

-----------------------------

STAR:makes u invinsible to anything for a short time

--------------------------

EDITOR

-------------------------

0 TO TOGGLE EDITOR MODE

1 FOR BASIC BLOCKS

2 FOR SPECIAL THINGS

3 FOR DROP THRU BLOCKS

4 FOR COIN AND SPAWNPOINT

9 FOR LIVING THINGS

5 FOR GRASS AND SLOPES

L TO CHOOSE A LEVEL

R TO RESET A LEVEL

Q TO TOGGLE AUTO ARANGING BLOCKS
